title: Get it together
creator_credit: Richard Miner, Herman S. Saunders and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Tells the true story of a young man who became a paraplegic as a result of a auto accident. Shows how he returned to college, married and began a career as a recreational therapist.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Miner, Herman S. Saunders and Pyramid Films
description: Tells the true story of a young man who became a paraplegic as a result of a auto accident. Shows how he returned to college, married and began a career as a recreational therapist.
